title: Detox Your Place: Room by Room Remedies for Nontoxic Living
author: Boston General Store
description: Looking to detox your home without the use of harsh chemicals or overly processed cleaning products? cleaned_text: Looking to detox your home without the use of harsh chemicals or overly processed cleaning products? This book will help you through the process, with well-researched advice about topics like making your own cleaning products, selecting paint, choosing a vacuum cleaner, and even replacing furniture and insulation. Includes recipes for creating your own versions of everyday item and tips on what to buy (and what to avoid!). Here's to living a happier, healthier life! Written by: Meadow Shadowlark Published by: Microcosm Publishing Specifications: 192 pages, 5x7", paperback
